comments: D\xc3\xa9sir\xc3\xa9e\'s "Advanced Conversation" course had the most confusing structure of any class I\'ve taken at Madison. Throughout the semester, you are required to complete presentations, papers, quizzes, and discussions at random times. Even worse, I didn\'t receive a single grade on an assignment all semester. Your final grade will be a complete surprise.

She is really laid back when it comes to homework. Her grading gets progressively harder through the semester on written work. She is pretty cool and brought her cute kindergarden daughter sometimes. She is good at teaching but gets frustrated when people can\'t do stuff well.

Great TA for Spanish. She\'s Cuban but her english is fun. Her accent is great and she tells a lot about her interesting life. She prepares you very well for tests and grades pretty easily on writing and orals. She even cuts out a lot of tests if she things it is too much. Great TA. Fun class.
